TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit VoiceInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示安装的语音合成引擎。

span.span: Represents an installed speech synthesis engine.

span.span: Gets additional information about the voice.

value.span: 返回描述和确定语音的名称/值对的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of name/value pairs that describe and identify the voice.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Age As VoiceAge
public: property System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceAge Age { System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceAge get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the age of the voice.
Returns the age of the voice.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取的成员枚举，指示该的语音的年龄。The property gets a member of the enumeration that indicates the age of the voice.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Culture As CultureInfo
public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the culture of the voice.

value.span: 返回对象，它提供有关特定区域性，例如区域性、 书写系统、 使用的日历的名称的信息以及如何设置日期和排序字符串。

span.span: Returns a object that provides information about a specific culture, such as the names of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定为每个区域的唯一名称。The class specifies a unique name for each culture. 名称是与语言相关的 ISO 639 双小写字母的区域性代码和与国家或地区相关的 ISO 3166 双字母的大写字母子区域性代码的组合。The name is a combination of an ISO 639 two-letter lowercase culture code associated with a language and an ISO 3166 two-letter uppercase subculture code associated with a country or region. 区域性名称的示例包括"es-美国"西班牙语，在美国或"FR-CA"读出加拿大法语。Examples of culture names include "es-US" for Spanish as spoken in the US, or "fr-CA" for French as spoken in Canada. 使用仅两位数字小写字母语言代码，可以指定一个非特定区域性。You can specify a neutral culture by using only the two-digit lowercase language code. 例如，"fr"表示法语，指定非特定区域性，并"de"德语指定非特定区域性。For example, "fr" specifies the neutral culture for French, and "de" specifies the neutral culture for German.

public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };
